item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

css/nava bar code

[code]

  • Home
  • About Us
  • Services
  • Products
  • Contact

ul#list-nav {
list-style:none;
margin:20px;
padding:0;
width:525px
}

ul#list-nav li {
display:inline
}

ul#list-nav li a {
text-decoration:none;
padding:5px 0;
width:100px;
background:#485e49;
color:#eee;
float:left;
text-align:center;
border-left:1px solid #fff;
}

ul#list-nav li a:hover {
background:#a2b3a1;
color:#000
}[/code]

what do i save the css style as? list-nav.css?
style.css?

need help

Read full topic
